scripts.lint: npm run lint:shell && npm run lint:format
scripts.lint:shell: shellcheck bin/*.sh lib/*.sh 2>/dev/null || echo 'No shell files found to lint'
scripts.format: npm run format:shell && npm run format:files
scripts.format:shell: ./.bin/shfmt -w bin/*.sh lib/*.sh 2>/dev/null || echo 'No shell files found to format'
